ORSHIN Attack Defense Framework

Fuse reading after their copy to a dedicated RAM

Description

Fuse reading after their copy to a dedicated RAM

CWE

CVE

Attack Surfaces

Private Key (MITRE EMB3D PID-12)

Memory (MITRE EMB3D PID-12)

Attack Vectors

ROM Extraction (MITRE EMB3D TID-108)

Reverse Engineering

Defenses

Make sure that the copy process will not leak fuse data, Encrypted copy only of the fuse.
